Council Member Tika Paudel
--------------------------

#### Term expires: May 2027

**Phone:**
817-685-1411, ext. 6 |
**Email:**
[place6@eulesstx.gov](https://forms.eulesstx.gov/Forms/CouncilContact?Contact=place6@eulesstx.gov)

![Place 6 Tika Paudel](https://www.eulesstx.gov/home/showpublishedimage/6956/638427377355270000)

Tika Paudel was elected to the Euless City Council in June 2021.

He has lived in Euless since 2007 and is a small business owner.

He is an active volunteer with his home owner’s association where he has held various positions including President over the past decade.

He is a member of the Euless Tax Reinvestment Zone Boards #3 and #4.

The City of Euless, TX
|
201 N. Ector Drive Euless, TX 76039
817-685-1400
